text: HPM #SheikhHasina has inaugurated #COVID19 #vaccination in #Dhaka, #Bangladesh: Runu Veronica Costa, senior staff nurse at Kurmitola Gen. Hospital, received the first #Oxford - #AstraZeneca #vaccine. Nationwide mass #COVIDVaccination to start from Feb 7 https://t.co/WrXKkvHd5m https://t.co/68gz6r6xhE
